chunk:
### ID
DAL-DEV-0015

### Project
Deviation

### Type
Deviation

### Title
Additional Components Needed for Batch
Upon filling of Norepinephrine Bitartrate 8mg/8ml Lot 10000096 on 16OCT24, the target number of units for the production order could not be obtained in the validated 8 hour fill time

. To enable Production to utilize the remaining bulk Norepinephrine Bitartrate 8mg/8ml product and reach the target units for the production order, the filling of this batch will have a Part 2 filling to occur tomorrow, 17OCT24. This will require additional filling materials: a new filter and pump tubing set.
